Fosil 'Monster' Penguasa Lautan Ditemukan
04 Nov 2019, 06:31 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Pliosaurus. Foto: Science in Poland

Warsawa - Periset di Polandia baru-baru ini menemukan fosil tulang dari makhluk lautan yang mengerikan, yang hidup pada 150 juta tahun silam.Saat sedang menggali di desa Krzyzanowice di Polandia, ahli paleontologi dari Museum of Erath di Warsawa menemukan tulang yang dimiliki oleh pliosaurus, sejenis dinosaurus.Dikutip detikINET dari 9News, pliosaurus adalah reptil di lautan dengan wujud seperti buaya super besar. Ia hidup pada zaman awal Jurassic Dr Daniel Tyborowski, salah satu peneliti, menyatakan sulit menemukan bandingan ukuran pliosaurus dengan hewan modern."Ukuran mereka lebih dari 10 meter panjangnya dan berat bisa tembus beberapa ton. Mereka punya tengkorak besar dan kuat, serta rahang yang masif dengan gigi besar dan tajam," jelasnya.


Foto: istimewa

Pliosarus diyakini memangsa beragam jenis hewan seperti ikan, hiu, dinosaurus lautan lain dan kura-kura pada zaman purba. Dr Daniel menyatakan inilah kali pertama tulangnya ditemukan di Polandia."Di Eropa, mereka ditemukan hanya di sedikit negara, belum pernah di Polandia," katanya. Beberapa hewan yang jadi mangsanya juga ditemukan fosilnya di lokasi tersebut."Kura-kura memakan bekicot besar dan mereka dimangsa oleh buaya besar. Di sisi lain, pliosaurus memburu semua fosil binatang yang kami temukan," tambahnya. Tim sampai saat ini masih meneliti lokasi itu dengan harapan menemukan lebih banyak fosil.Simak Video "Wow! Ocean Ruler Found 'Fossil' Fossil
Nov 04 2019, 06:31 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Pliosaurus. Photo: Science in Poland

Warsaw - Researchers in Poland recently discovered bone fossils from terrible sea creatures, which lived 150 million years ago. While digging in the village of Krzyzanowice in Poland, paleontologists from the Museum of Erath in Warsaw found bones owned by pliosaurs, a kind of dinosaur. Quoted from 9News, pliosaurs are reptiles in the ocean with a shape like a super large crocodile. He lived in the early Jurassic era Dr. Daniel Tyborowski, one of the researchers, said that it was difficult to find a comparison between the size of pliosaurs and modern animals. with big and sharp teeth, "he explained.


Photo: special

Pliosarus is believed to prey on various types of animals such as fish, sharks, other marine dinosaurs and turtles in ancient times. Dr Daniel said this was the first time his bones had been found in Poland. "In Europe, they were found in only a few countries, never in Poland," he said. Some of the animals that became their prey were also found at the site. "Turtles eat large snails and they are preyed on by large crocodiles. On the other hand, pliosaurs hunted for all the animal fossils we found," he added. The team is still researching the location until now, hoping to find more fossils. Watch "Wow!
